item.title: Publications & Projects
item.description: My publications, conference proceedings and other stuff can be found listed here. Below this, you can find further information about ongoing projects. Journal articles Link to heading • Lewendon, J., Britton, J., Politzer-Ahles, S.J. (under review) The ‘Phonological?’ Mapping Negativity – language specificity of auditory ERP responses, Targeted journal: PLOS ONE • Vari, J., Lewendon, J. (under review) Studying implicit automatic language attitudes: Methodological challenges of the Affective Priming Paradigm. Language & Communication.
